episodes.title: America's Most Diabolical Serial Killer: Exposing the Double Life and Creepy Murders of Israel Keyes
episodes.description:
From Cult to Killer...the story of Israel Keyes has rarely been told.  After leaving a cult, Israel went on a murder-spree for over a decade.  He was known as a doting boyfriend and father but his secrets were disturbing even for the most hardcore true crime fans.  Let's explore his life, the cults he and his family hopped to and from; and crimes in today's episode of Let The Fresh Erin.
